title: PM for apprehending killers of two PTI supporters during AJK polls
content:
ISLAMABAD, July 26 (APP) Prime Minister Imran Khan on Monday expressing his grief over the killing of two supporter of Pakistan Tehrik-e-Insaf (PTI) during the AJK elections,, instructed the Inspectors General of Police to immediately apprehend the killers.
“Saddened to learn of the killing of our two supporters Zaheer Ahmed & Ramzan, both cousins, during the AJK elections yesterday,” Imran Khan said in a twitter post.
Saddened to learn of the killing of our two supporters Zaheer Ahmed & Ramzan, both cousins, during the AJK elections yesterday. My condolences & prayers go to the families. I have instructed the IG to immediately apprehend the killers & commiserate with the families.
— Imran Khan (@ImranKhanPTI) July 26, 2021
Conveying his condolences and prayers to the families, the Prime Minister in his tweet said that he had instructed the IG (Inspector General of Police) Azad Jammu and Kashmir (AJK) to immediately apprehend the killers and commiserate with the families.
